title: FAQ 1. pyparsing distribution misrecognition error while installing gdown
body:
## Problem
When you have an error while installing `PanChIP` using `pip3 install panchip` which is due to a `pyparsing` distribution misrecognition during `gdown` installation, try installing pyparsing with sudo permissions.
## Solution
`sudo pip3 install pyparsing`
`pip3 install panchip`
